title: George Rogers Clark National Historical Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar               Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 1 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      George Rogers Clark National Historical Park Native American Cultures Day      Time: 1:00 PM to 4:00 PM Location: George Rogers Clark NHP Fees: Free     Saturday, August 20, 2016 Join staff and volunteers of George Rogers Clark NHP as we celebrate the cultures of the various tribes of Native Americans who lived in this region.
